title: Samsung doesnâ€™t include a charger with the Galaxy Tab S8 series; even the iPad does that
content:
Over the past two years, chargers have disappeared from the box on most flagship smartphones. Now, the same is happening to tablets, as Samsung has stopped including a charger with the Galaxy Tab S8.

more…

The post Samsung doesn’t include a charger with the Galaxy Tab S8 series; even the iPad does that appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung has stopped including a charger with its latest tablets, the Galaxy Tab S8, S8+, and S8 Ultra, despite Apple still providing one.
